Primary_Text: Isa kõva norskamine äratas lapse üles
Analyzed: isa kõva norska-mine ärata-s lapse üles
Gloss: father.GEN loud snore-NMLZ wake-PST.3SG child.GEN up
Translation: Father's loud snoring woke up the child

Primary_Text: Oled sa temalt ka hiljem kirju saanud?
Analyzed: ole-d sa tema-lt ka hiljem kirju saa-nud
Translation: Have you recieved letters from him later as well?
Mari is said to write poems
the owner is feeding the horse
I am working : I have been working
The boy goes running in the evenings

Primary_Text: Ma usun, et Jüri sõitis hommikul Juhaniga Helsingisse
Analyzed: ma usu-n et Jüri sõit-is hommiku-l Juhani-ga Helsingi-sse
Gloss: 1SG believe-1SG COMP Jüri drive-PST.3SG morning-ADE Juhan-COM Helsinki-ILL
Translation: I believe that Jüri drove to Helsinki with Juhan in the morning

Primary_Text: Ma kuulsin, et sa olid haige
Analyzed: ma kuul-si-n et sa ol-i-d haige
Translation: I heard that you were sick
Mom made four jars of strawberry jam
Newspapers will not be published today
Peeter does not have a summer cottage

Primary_Text: Kas Indiasse sõiduks on vaja viisat?
Analyzed: kas India-sse sõidu-ks on vaja viisa-t
Gloss: Q India-ILL drive-ILL be.3SG need visa-PRT
Translation: Do you need a visa to go to India?
Do you want to come home with me?
The tasks had been done by us

Primary_Text: Kui palju sa must noorem oled?
Analyzed: kui palju sa mu-st noore-m ole-d
Translation: How much younger are you than me?
How many children are you planning to have?

Primary_Text: Mart, keda me usaldasime, vedas meid alt
Analyzed: Mart ke-da me usalda-si-me veda-s me-i-d alt
Translation: Mart, who we trusted, let us down

Primary_Text: Käisin Juhani juures, kes elab Koplis
Analyzed: käi-si-n Juhani juures kes ela-b Kopli-s
Gloss: go-PST-1SG Juhan.GEN at who live-3SG Kopli-INE
Translation: I went to Juhan's, who lives in Kopli

Primary_Text: Ta teadis, et sõbral oli õigus
Analyzed: ta tead-is et sõbra-l ol-i õigus
Translation: S/he knew that the friend was right
